name: Object Dumps
description:
We're given a compiled binary for a program that was written in C. We want the function address of the 'func' function! Can you help us find it?

The binary is available here: dumper
hint:
objdump or any disassembler may be helpful in solving this problem.

Please note that this problem is asking for the function address, so the standard flag format for this competition does not apply to this problem.
